I have [Jakarta] Commons Logging code in my classes, and I notice 
that JUnit picks up the 'info' messages and puts them at the top of 
the text file produced when the tests are run.  

I would like to also see the log statements for levels lower 
then 'info', all the way down to 'debug'.  How do I make that happen?

I use ant, like this:
<target name="test" depends="compile-test">
     <junit>
       <test name="edu.asu.vpia.dao.TestUniDataReportDAO"/>
       <formatter type="plain"/>
       <classpath refid="project.classpath"/>
     </junit>
   </target>

The only thing on 
http://ant.apache.org/manual/OptionalTasks/junit.html that looks 
promising is the 'showoutput' parameter, but that did not cause 
the 'debug' messages to show up.

Thanks,

Wendy in Tempe, AZ
